title: tour: [local] No way to interrupt looped exercise from GUI
body:
Context: /flowcontrol/8

Sorry if this was reported already but quick search didn't yield anything resembling this problem

Description:
I pressed "format" button during exercise execution and console part of UI returned to "idle" state but program continued to run independently in the background causing my machine to overheat. Interrupt button would be nice. I ran gotour on OS X Yosemite if this makes any difference.

Thanks for all the hard work creating this fun concise language! :+1:
